name: Striped Blue Shirt
description:
## Striped Blue Shirt

Yo ho ho, the pirate with the Striped Blue Shirt has style that'll make even Davy Jones jealous!

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
